Labor

challenge for our industry and with some AMD suppliers. Labor represented  39 percent  of all NCs in our 
company’s supply chain in 2021,  however only one was a p riority NC. Regardless, a ll suppliers were 
required to complete corrective actions for identified issues. Factories continued to face the challenge 
of keeping up with demand while implementing COVID -19 safety protocols in 2021. As such, the  highest
